mapper.select: SELECT XSTAT FROM IF_INFO WHERE IDX = (SELECT IF_INFO_IDX FROM IF_TRS_ELN_TEST_METHOD_BY_ITEM WHERE AMITM_CD = #{amitmCd})

SELECT AITM_CD , AITM_KN , AITM_EN , AITM_ABBR , CRT_IP , CRT_DS , CRT_UID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = CRT_UID) CRT_USER_NM , UDT_IP , UDT_DS , UDT_UID FROM MS_AITM WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER(AITM_KN) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{aitmKn} || '%')
AND UPPER(AITM_EN) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{aitmEn} || '%')
AND UPPER(AITM_ABBR) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{aitmAbbr} || '%')
ORDER BY AITM_KN DESC NULLS LAST
